channel.title: Comments on: Mwari
channel.description: A detailed history of the Shona people of Zimbabwe

item.title: By: Timothy
item.dc:creator: Timothy
item.description: Yes, i believe there is a great connection of Mwari of our Ancestors and the Christian God really especially when we want to look at this controversial issue of inculturation and some others values we are losing ..........really I conquer with some few individuals who still want to publicly practice African religion with great respect and honor.... Of course in this perverse generation of ours we may nor want to believe it but they are still good signs of the present of Mwari of our Ancestors in our African culture.
item.content:encoded: Yes, i believe there is a great connection of Mwari of our Ancestors and the Christian God really especially when we want to look at this controversial issue of inculturation and some others values we are losing ……….really I conquer with some few individuals who still want to publicly practice African religion with great respect and honor…. Of course in this perverse generation of ours we may nor want to believe it but they are still good signs of the present of Mwari of our Ancestors in our African culture.

item.title: By: K Chikuse
item.dc:creator: K Chikuse
item.description: that is correct, Mwari is <strong>not</strong> the Hebrew God
item.content:encoded: that is correct, Mwari is not the Hebrew God

item.title: By: Marshall Blessings Hove
item.dc:creator: Marshall Blessings Hove
item.description: so Mwari is not the Hebrew God? or Allah right?
item.content:encoded: so Mwari is not the Hebrew God? or Allah right?

item.title: By: Stephen Manzunzu Nyandoro Biri
item.dc:creator: Stephen Manzunzu Nyandoro Biri
item.description: PAUL MWAZHA OF AFRICA IS PREACHING ABOUT RECREATION OF AFRICA & RETURNING PEOPLE TO THE OLD SYSTEM OF WORSHIP WERE PEOPLE SHOULD WORSHIP THE LIVING GOD .,THE GOD AND ONE GOD WHO USED TO SPEAK TO OUR ANCESTORS DIRECT.THEY KEPT THE TEN COMMANDMENTS.THEY KEPT HOLLY AND RESPECTED AND FEARED MWARI.
item.content:encoded: PAUL MWAZHA OF AFRICA IS PREACHING ABOUT RECREATION OF AFRICA & RETURNING PEOPLE TO THE OLD SYSTEM OF WORSHIP WERE PEOPLE SHOULD WORSHIP THE LIVING GOD .,THE GOD AND ONE GOD WHO USED TO SPEAK TO OUR ANCESTORS DIRECT.THEY KEPT THE TEN COMMANDMENTS.THEY KEPT HOLLY AND RESPECTED AND FEARED MWARI.

item.title: By: Gore
item.dc:creator: Gore
item.description: This is very interesting especially regarding the lessening influence of Mwari after independence. Could it be then that's the cause of most of the challenges the country is going through. If the belief in Mwari and our culture enabled us Africans to win the war of independence why have turned our back to our own. Now we have embraced Christianity and its prophets etc, look where we are now. We may not want it to believe it but I see a connection here. We betrayed Mwari and he turned his back on us. And the Christian God must be happy and rejoicing.
item.content:encoded: This is very interesting especially regarding the lessening influence of Mwari after independence. Could it be then that’s the cause of most of the challenges the country is going through. If the belief in Mwari and our culture enabled us Africans to win the war of independence why have turned our back to our own. Now we have embraced Christianity and its prophets etc, look where we are now. We may not want it to believe it but I see a connection here. We betrayed Mwari and he turned his back on us. And the Christian God must be happy and rejoicing.
